Key.English: Knock out enemy communications ahead of a larger assault.

You and your team have landed on Altis under cover of the morning fog. Your mission is to knock out the enemy's military communications ahead of BLUFOR's main assault.%1OPFOR's key military radio towers are marked on your map. Find transportation and destroy the towers.%1Watch out for air and ground resistance. You've made a quiet landing, but you won't go unnoticed for long...

There's a %3military outpost%2 near your LZ. The troops stationed there probably have some sort of transport.%1You can also take a look around villages, towns and cities. OPFOR has probably left behind a couple of junkers during their sweep across the island.%1Finally, satellite imagery suggests OPFOR is restoring some BLUFOR equipment at several well-guarded military bases around the island -- probably captured during our failed assault in the spring. If you happen across any of our lost toys... you know what to do.
You successfully knocked out the enemy's communications infrastructure, granting our main invasion force the upper hand.
